mapper.select: select a.name, count(b.id) as value from blog_category a left join blog_article b on a.id=b.category_id GROUP BY a.id

select a.id,a.name,a.sort,a.create_time,a.click_volume,a.icon,b.articleCount from blog_category a left join (select category_id,count(id) as articleCount from blog_article group by category_id) b on a.id=b.category_id
a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
